Race.SpecificTitle: Alderman -- District E, Town of Krotz Springs
Road Dist. No. 1 -- 2% Sales Tax - PC
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 1 Proposition
(2% Sales Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 1 of the Parish of St. Landry (consisting only of the unincorporated areas) be authorized to levy and collect a tax of two percent (2%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $7,700,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), beginning January 1, 2014, and ending December 31, 2028, upon sale at retail, use, lease or rental, consumption, and storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, with the net proceeds of the Tax (after paying the necessary costs and expenses of collecting the Tax in accordance with Louisiana law and no additional fees or costs will be charged from Parish Government) to be dedicated and used only and exclusively for constructing, improving roads, bridges and related drainage in the District, in accordance with the St. Landry Parish Home Rule Charter and not to be excepted from section 4-11, its subparts A-G and Priority list, (including necessary rights of way) and shall the District further be authorized to fund the proceeds of the Tax into bonds for such purposes in the manner provided by law?
